title: Designer/Builder
content:
This art was sent to me - no idea on source. Can anyone ID this font?

I have attached a larger version - does this help?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [designer-build.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052224/http:/typophile.com/files/designer-build.jpg) | 13.35 KB |
| [designer2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052224/http:/typophile.com/files/designer2.jpg) | 13.91 KB |
author: evan

comments.content: A larger version (designer2) was added to my original posting - hope it helps.

That was originally VGC’s ‘Markus Roman’ (by Markus J. Low I presume, but don’t know for sure). The only digital version I’m aware of is Brendel Informatik’s [Caesar](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052224/http:/www.qbf.de/cart/cart.exe?gif=dc.gif/Sdc02682.gif).
